Fiscal performance
Despite the disruption of COVID-19, we delivered a solid financial performance in FY 2020. We 
generated over $10 billion in revenue, representing a five-year compound annual growth rate of 
nearly 14% and net income per diluted share of $15.10. This was nearly a 10% increase over fiscal 
year 2019. Lam’s performance in 2020 demonstrates the resiliency of our business, driven by 
best-in-class products and services, high quality operational execution, and exceptional talent 
throughout our employee base. These financials are presented in conformity with U.S. Generally 
Accepted Accounting Principles. For more information about our financial performance, please 
visit our investor page .
